amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being used by the Secretary of Energy to designate any geographic area as a national interest electric transmission corridor.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to assure that no funds be made available to designate any geographic area as a national interest electric transmission corridor under the Federal Power Act by the Secretary of Energy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hinchey amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 257 (Roll no. 526).
